item.title: [Kaggle] Specialty Cofee Grades
item.description: Coffee quality prediction Originally published on Kaggle Introduction Hi, I’m Nikita. I love good coffee. You probably have seen a lot of specialty cafes around (or probably sitting in one right now while reading this and drinking your Geisha coffee made in Chemex). For coffee to be put in the “specialty” category it has to be graded higher than 80 points on a 100 point scale. People who taste and grade coffee are trained specialists (like wine sommeliers) called q-graders.
